entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
